    • Method Detail

      • search

        public java.util.List<NoVertex> search(NoVertex source)
                                throws IllegalGraphFormatException
        Description copied from class: IFleury
        While the number of edges the original graph is different to 0(zero):
        1. Verify if this source is leaf. Returning a Throw Exception if True.
        2. Get the next preferably not bridge edge.
        3. Adding this vertex destination of got edge in the Eulerian Tour Sequence.
        4. Remove this edge from the graph(this edge and your reverse edge).
        5. Attribute the adjacent(destination) vertex this edge in the source variable.

        When this loop over, return the Eulerian Tour Sequence.

        Specified by:
        search in class IFleury
        Parameters:
        source - Type: NoVertex. Vertex to start the algorithm
        Returns:
        Returns a Eulerian Tour Sequence from that Graph passed by the Constructor and started from the source vertex.
        Throws:
        IllegalGraphFormatException
